scripts.build_dir: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/js dist/css dist/assets
scripts.build_docs: rm -rf docs ; mkdir docs docs/css docs/assets docs/js
scripts.build_css: npm run css && npm run autoprefixer --source-maps
scripts.build: npm run build_css && npm run build_js && npm run build_html && npm run build_assets
scripts.dev: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.prod_git: postcss -u postcss-simple-vars -o docs/css/style.css src/css/* && postcss -u autoprefixer -r docs/css/* && babel src/js --out-file docs/js/script.js && cp index.html docs && cp -r src/assets docs/assets
